languages.text: {n}Назракей издает смешок.{/n} "Справедливо. Что ж... вот твоя награда, мон-кай. А теперь убирайся отсюда — и жди нового визита. Вскоре Черное сердце придет собрать дань с твоих собратьев — начинайте готовиться".

traits.locale_text: {n}Назракей издает смешок.{/n} "Справедливо. Что ж... вот твоя награда, мон-кай. А теперь убирайся отсюда — и жди нового визита. Вскоре Черное сердце придет собрать дань с твоих собратьев — начинайте готовиться".
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei chuckles.{/n} "Fair enough. Very well... here is your reward, mon-keigh. Now get out of here, and wait for another visit. The Black Heart will soon come to exact tribute from your kin, so you had better be ready."
languages.original_text: {n}Назракей издает смешок.{/n} "Справедливо. Что ж... вот твоя награда, мон-кай. А теперь убирайся отсюда — и жди нового визита. Вскоре Черное сердце придет собрать дань с твоих собратьев — начинайте готовиться".

traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei lacht.{/n} "Also schön. Gut ... hier ist Eure Belohnung, Chem-Pan-Sey. Und nun verschwindet und wartet auf einen weiteren Besuch. Das Schwarze Herz wird schon bald kommen, um Tribut von Eurem Volk zu fordern, also haltet Euch bereit."
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei chuckles.{/n} "Fair enough. Very well... here is your reward, mon-keigh. Now get out of here, and wait for another visit. The Black Heart will soon come to exact tribute from your kin, so you had better be ready."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei lacht.{/n} "Also schön. Gut ... hier ist Eure Belohnung, Chem-Pan-Sey. Und nun verschwindet und wartet auf einen weiteren Besuch. Das Schwarze Herz wird schon bald kommen, um Tribut von Eurem Volk zu fordern, also haltet Euch bereit."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}纳札骸笑了起来。{/n}“说得不错。很好……这是赏给你的奖励，猴子。行了，快滚吧，等待我们的下一次拜访。黑心阴谋团马上就要来向你的族人索要贡品了，所以你最好做足准备。”
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei chuckles.{/n} "Fair enough. Very well... here is your reward, mon-keigh. Now get out of here, and wait for another visit. The Black Heart will soon come to exact tribute from your kin, so you had better be ready."

traits.locale_text: {n}纳札骸笑了起来。{/n}“说得不错。很好……这是赏给你的奖励，猴子。行了，快滚吧，等待我们的下一次拜访。黑心阴谋团马上就要来向你的族人索要贡品了，所以你最好做足准备。”
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei retient un gloussement.{/n} « Je vois. Très bien... voici votre récompense, mon-keigh. Et maintenant, partez, et attendez-vous à une autre visite. Le Cœur Noir viendra bientôt réclamer un tribut à votre peuple, alors préparez-vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei chuckles.{/n} "Fair enough. Very well... here is your reward, mon-keigh. Now get out of here, and wait for another visit. The Black Heart will soon come to exact tribute from your kin, so you had better be ready."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei retient un gloussement.{/n} « Je vois. Très bien... voici votre récompense, mon-keigh. Et maintenant, partez, et attendez-vous à une autre visite. Le Cœur Noir viendra bientôt réclamer un tribut à votre peuple, alors préparez-vous. »
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei se ríe.{/n} «De acuerdo... toma tu recompensa, mon-keigh. Y ahora márchate y espera nuestra siguiente visita. El Corazón Negro pronto exigirá tributo a tu gente, así que será mejor que te prepares».
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei chuckles.{/n} "Fair enough. Very well... here is your reward, mon-keigh. Now get out of here, and wait for another visit. The Black Heart will soon come to exact tribute from your kin, so you had better be ready."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei se ríe.{/n} «De acuerdo... toma tu recompensa, mon-keigh. Y ahora márchate y espera nuestra siguiente visita. El Corazón Negro pronto exigirá tributo a tu gente, así que será mejor que te prepares».
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}ナズラクヘイがほくそ笑む。{/n}「いいだろう。よし…これがお前の報酬だ、モン＝ケイ。失せろ。そして次の訪問を待て。黒き心臓はすぐにお前の同族からの貢物を要求しにくるだろう。準備をしておくんだな」
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei chuckles.{/n} "Fair enough. Very well... here is your reward, mon-keigh. Now get out of here, and wait for another visit. The Black Heart will soon come to exact tribute from your kin, so you had better be ready."

traits.locale_text: {n}ナズラクヘイがほくそ笑む。{/n}「いいだろう。よし…これがお前の報酬だ、モン＝ケイ。失せろ。そして次の訪問を待て。黒き心臓はすぐにお前の同族からの貢物を要求しにくるだろう。準備をしておくんだな」
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei gülüyor.{/n} "Öyle olsun. Pekâlâ, ödülünü buyur mon-keigh. Şimdi git ve bir sonraki ziyaretimizi bekle. Kara Yürek, yakında hakkı olanı türünüzden almaya gelecek. Hazır olsanız iyi edersiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Nazrakhei chuckles.{/n} "Fair enough. Very well... here is your reward, mon-keigh. Now get out of here, and wait for another visit. The Black Heart will soon come to exact tribute from your kin, so you had better be ready."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei gülüyor.{/n} "Öyle olsun. Pekâlâ, işte ödülün mon-keigh. Şimdi git buradan ve bir sonraki ziyaretimizi bekle. Kara Yürek yakında türüne saygılarını sunmaya gelecektir, kendini hazırlasan iyi edersin."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey
